Description: Body sherd of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery amphora. On the left area of paint from the top - purple, then an incised line, then a white stripe; on the right area at the top, the end of a purple stripe. Possibly part of lotus and palmette frieze.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 587, 6)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 180)
